participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and introspective, with a deep understanding of personal struggles and a desire to help others.
participant_1.background: i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i now live in the city. i'm a recovering alcoholic. i am a 45 year old male.

participant_2.background: my pets name is charlie. i produce music for artists. my favourite food is pizza. i drive a 2015 honda civic.

content.text: Hey! Are you a recovering alcoholic? Because I am.
